overview: The Velo bike messenger boys work long hours navigating new relationships, overbearing bosses and upset customers in an unforgiving urban environment. Our hero Matthew Keading is forced to pay the consequences for sleeping in with boyfriend Jessie Montgomery when hot jock Ty Roderick accepts Matthew’s ass as payment for his late delivery. Bad boy Jacob Dixon knows how to be fast on the bike and smooth with the boys as he seduces pampered millionaire Damon Archer and plows his ass bareback for all it’s worth. The daily grind doesn’t stop until Matthew finally returns home to Jessie for an exhilarating flip-fuck with his big dick blond boy toy.
title: Velo
